com.storageroomapp.client

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.storageroomapp.client.Application

  • public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    Application is the parent object to all interaction within the Java StorageRoom API.

    To start working with StorageRoom, you must call getInstance() with your application name.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Application getInstance(java.lang.String name)
        Obtains an instance of Application to start working with the API. The passed name should match the name you gave your application in the StorageRoom UI.

        It is fully supported to use two different StorageRoom application keys at the same time using this library. Simply use distinct names when calling getInstance().

        Note, if this application has been retrieved previously, and connected, the returned object here will be in the connected state.

        Parameters:
        name - the String name of the application
        Returns:
        an Application object which may or may not be connected depending if the Application has been used before in this JVM

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this application as reported by the StorageRoom API.
        Returns:
        the String name, or null if this Application has never connected

      • getAccountId

        public java.lang.String getAccountId()
        Returns the accountId of this application.
        Returns:
        the String id, or null if this Application has never connected

      • getAuthToken

        public java.lang.String getAuthToken()
        Returns the authToken used by this application.
        Returns:
        the String token, or null if this Application has never connected

      • getAccountInfo

        public AccountInfo getAccountInfo(boolean useCache)
        Returns the AccountInfo returned during connect()
        Parameters:
        useCache - if false, the call will always trigger a connect() call
        Returns:
        the AccountInfo object, or null if it cannot be obtained

      • connect

        public boolean connect(java.lang.String accountId,
              java.lang.String authToken,
              boolean useCache)
        Makes a live call to the StorageRoom API. This will populate the AccountInfo object associated with this Application, but only if the passed accountId+authToken pair are valid, and only if the StorageRoom API is network accessible.

        SERVER ROUND TRIP: this is a live API call

        Parameters:
        accountId - the String accountId as provided by the SR GUI
        authToken - the String accountToken as provided by the SR GUI
        useCache - if false, the SR API call will be made even if already connected
        Returns:
        true if the connect() attempt succeeded, false if not

      • getCollections

        public Collections getCollections(boolean useCache)
        Retrieves the list of Collections visible to this Application for this Account.
        Parameters:
        useCache - if false, the SR API call will be made even if the collections are already cached
        Returns:
        the Collections object or null if a failure occurred
